languages.text: {n}Девочка фыркает и пихает Нэми локтем.{/n} "Правильно — Ваша Светлость. И не шути, раз не умеешь, иначе Лорд-капитан передумает и обратно тебя отправит!"

{n}Mia snorts and elbows Nemi in the ribs.{/n} "It's 'Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'! And don't make jokes when you're so terrible at them. Do you want the Lord Captain to change {mf|his|her} mind and send you back?"
languages.original_text: {n}Девочка фыркает и пихает Нэми локтем.{/n} "Правильно — Ваша Светлость. И не шути, раз не умеешь, иначе Лорд-капитан передумает и обратно тебя отправит!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mia snorts and elbows Nemi in the ribs.{/n} "It's 'Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}.' And don't make jokes if you're terrible at them, unless you want the Lord Captain to change {mf|his|her} mind and send you back!"
traits.speaker: InfernusDaughter

languages.text: {n}Mia s'esclaffe et donne un coup de coude dans les côtes de Nemi.{/n} « Tu t'adresses à Sa Seigneurie, je te signale ! Et laisse-moi te dire que tes blagues sont de très mauvais goût. Tu veux vraiment que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} change d'avis et te renvoie avec les autres ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Mia snorts and elbows Nemi in the ribs.{/n} "It's 'Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'! And don't make jokes when you're so terrible at them. Do you want the Lord Captain to change {mf|his|her} mind and send you back?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mia s'esclaffe et donne un coup de coude dans les côtes de Nemi.{/n} « Tu t'adresses à Sa Seigneurie, je te signale ! Et laisse-moi te dire que tes blagues sont de très mauvais goût. Tu veux vraiment que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} change d'avis et te renvoie avec les autres ? »
traits.speaker: InfernusDaughter

languages.text: {n}Mia resopla y le da un codazo a Nemi en el costillar.{/n} «¡Se dice "mi{mf|lord|lady}"! Y no cuentes chistes tan malos, ¿quieres que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán cambie de opinión y te mande de vuelta?».
languages.original_text: {n}Mia snorts and elbows Nemi in the ribs.{/n} "It's 'Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'! And don't make jokes when you're so terrible at them. Do you want the Lord Captain to change {mf|his|her} mind and send you back?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mia resopla y le da un codazo a Nemi en el costillar.{/n} «¡Se dice "mi{mf|lord|lady}"! Y no cuentes chistes tan malos, ¿quieres que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán cambie de opinión y te mande de vuelta?».
traits.speaker: InfernusDaughter

languages.text: {n}米娅哼了一声，用胳膊肘戳了一下涅米的肋骨。{/n}“是‘大人’！如果你不会开玩笑，就别硬开玩笑了。你是想让舰长大人改主意，再把你关进去吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Mia snorts and elbows Nemi in the ribs.{/n} "It's 'Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'! And don't make jokes when you're so terrible at them. Do you want the Lord Captain to change {mf|his|her} mind and send you back?"

traits.locale_text: {n}米娅哼了一声，用胳膊肘戳了一下涅米的肋骨。{/n}“是‘大人’！如果你不会开玩笑，就别硬开玩笑了。你是想让舰长大人改主意，再把你关进去吗？”
traits.speaker: InfernusDaughter

languages.text: {n}ミアは鼻をならして、ネミのあばらを肘でつっついた。{/n}「陛下だ！あと、冗談言うのが下手なら言わないでいいから。ロード・キャプテンが考えを変えて、あなたを送り返してくれることを望んでいるの？」
languages.original_text: {n}Mia snorts and elbows Nemi in the ribs.{/n} "It's 'Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'! And don't make jokes when you're so terrible at them. Do you want the Lord Captain to change {mf|his|her} mind and send you back?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ミアは鼻をならして、ネミのあばらを肘でつっついた。{/n}「陛下だ！あと、冗談言うのが下手なら言わないでいいから。ロード・キャプテンが考えを変えて、あなたを送り返してくれることを望んでいるの？」
traits.speaker: InfernusDaughter

languages.text: {n}Mia schnaubt auf und rammt Nemi den Ellbogen in die Rippen.{/n} "Es heißt 'Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}'! Und macht keine Witze, das konntet Ihr noch nie. Wollt Ihr, dass der Lord Captain seine Meinung ändert und Euch zurückschickt?"
languages.original_text: {n}Mia snorts and elbows Nemi in the ribs.{/n} "It's 'Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'! And don't make jokes when you're so terrible at them. Do you want the Lord Captain to change {mf|his|her} mind and send you back?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mia schnaubt auf und rammt Nemi den Ellbogen in die Rippen.{/n} "Es heißt 'Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}'! Und macht keine Witze, das konntet Ihr noch nie. Wollt Ihr, dass der Lord Captain seine Meinung ändert und Euch zurückschickt?"
traits.speaker: InfernusDaughter

languages.text: {n}Mia, homurdanarak Nemi'nin kaburgalarına dirsek atıyor.{/n} "'{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri' diyeceksin! Ayrıca espri anlayışın bu kadar kötüyken şaka yapma. Lord Kaptan'ın fikrini değiştirip seni geri göndermesini mi istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: {n}Mia snorts and elbows Nemi in the ribs.{/n} "It's 'Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'! And don't make jokes when you're so terrible at them. Do you want the Lord Captain to change {mf|his|her} mind and send you back?"
